mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.board_type, c.board_id, c.user_id, c.parent_id, c.content, c.created_at, c.updated_at, c.deleted, u.nickname, u.profile_image AS profileImage FROM comments c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND deleted = 'N' ORDER BY c.parent_id ASC, c.created_at ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE comments SET content = #{content}, updated_at = SYSDATE WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE comments SET updated_at = SYSDATE, deleted = 'Y' WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
